description: A pixel art style snow simulator. Fire, rain, "birds" and fireflies can also be simulated. Made with drws-lib. (There's a PC version).
long_description:
A snow pixel art style simulator.

Features:
- You can push or pull particles around with the mouse.
- Also you can control the number of particles.

Simulations:
- Snow
- Fire
- Rain
- "Birds"
- Fireflies

Made with drws-lib.
